MASTERS IN MANAGMENT

Management courses are one of the most popular choices of graduation subject for any student in India after class 12th. They offer plenty of employment as well as higher education opportunities for a student. Here are some reasons why you should consider taking up a management course after class 12th.

 

Bachelor in Management

Class 12th or Intermediate is a very important milestone in any student’s life. It is also a very crucial time as the choices made by a student at this stage may define what they do in their long-term career. A student may also feel pressurised to take up a course or stream just because their parents think it is best or just because their friends are going for it.

A part of this is because there are innumerable options of streams, degrees, courses and colleges a student can take up after class 12th, and with nobody there to explain the pros and cons and scope of these options, life can get confusing very quickly. At this point, it is very important for a student to keep a steady head and weigh all options carefully before investing their time, money and efforts into pursuing a course.

One of the most popular streams of higher education in India is management. Management courses offer a number of benefits to a student and there are a number of reasons why management courses should be considered by a student after class 12th.

BBA Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Business Administration
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] is 3 Years.
Age Between 17 and 25
Minimum Percentage 50% in 10+2 from a recognised board
Subjects Required English in 10+2
Average Fees Incurred The average BBA course fee ranges from INR 1 to 2.5 lakh per annum
Similar Options of Study BBS, BBM, B.Com, BMS
Average Salary Offered The average BBA salary is INR 4.2 lakhs per annum
Employment Roles Information Systems Manager, Business Administration Professor, Production Manager, Finance Manager, Human Resource Manager, Business Administration Researcher, Management Accountant etc.
Placement Opportunities Accenture, EY (Ernst & Young), Wipro Technologies Ltd., HDFC Bank Pvt Ltd, Deutsche Bank, Amazon.com Inc, Concentrix Corporation, Societe Generale, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Royal Bank of Scotland etc.

BCom Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Commerce
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Commerce [B.Com] is 3 Years.
Age No age limit
Minimum Percentage 45% in 10+2 from a recognized Board
Subjects Required Commerce, Business, Accountancy, Business Mathematics / Statistics / Economics
Average Fees Incurred The average B.Com course fee ranges from INR 7.5K to 1L per annum
Similar Options of Study B.Com [Hons], BBA, BBM, BBS, BMS, CA, CS, CMA, ICWA etc.
Average Salary Offered The average B.Com salary in India is INR 4.42 L per annum
Employment Roles Accountant, Operations Manager, Financial Analyst, Finance Manager, Account Executive, Executive Assistant, Chartered Accountant etc.
Placement Opportunities Tata Consultancy Services Limited, Genpact, Accenture, EY (Ernst & Young), J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. (JPMCC), HDFC Bank Pvt Ltd, HSBC are the top recruiters

BA LLB Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BA LLB] is 5 Years.
Age 19-23
Minimum Percentage 55%
Subjects Required Subjects related to 10+2 commerce stream
Average Fees Incurred INR 30,000 - 1.5 L per annum
Similar Options of Study BBA LLB, B.Com LLB, B.Sc LLB, LLB
Average Salary Offered INR 1.8 L - 1 Cr per annum
Employment Roles Advocate, Public Prosecutor, Solicitor, Legal Advisor, Attorney General, District & Sessions Judge, Munsifs (Sub-Magistrate), Legal Manager, Associate Attorney, Legal Counsel, HR Manager etc.
Placement Opportunities LexisNexis, Archer Daniels Midland Company, ICICI Bank, Kla-Tencor Corporation, Jacobs Engineering Group Inc. etc. Private practice has a wide range of opportunities.

BBA LLB Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBA LLB] is 5 Years.
Age No Age Limit Specified
Minimum Percentage 50%
Subjects Required 10+2 equivalent from Recognized Education Board
Average Fees Incurred INR 35,000 - 1.5 L per annum
Similar Options of Study BA LLB, B.Com LLB, B.Sc LLB, LLB
Average Salary Offered INR 2L - 1 Cr per annum
Employment Roles Advocate, Public Prosecutor, Solicitor, Legal Advisor, Attorney General, District & Sessions Judge, Sub-Magistrate, Legal Manager, Associate Attorney, Legal Counsel, HR Manager etc.
Placement Opportunities Private Practice, LexisNexis, Archer Daniels Midland Company, ICICI Bank, Kla-Tencor Corporation, Jacobs Engineering Group Inc. etc.

BHM Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Hospitality Management
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Hospitality Management [BHM] is 3 Years.
Age No age limit as such
Minimum Percentage 50% in 10+2
Subjects Required Any stream 10+2
Average Fees Incurred INR 1.24 L to 2.56 LPA
Similar Options of Study BHM, B.Sc (Hotel Management)
Average Salary Offered The average salary for hospitality manager is INR 4.28 L per annum
Employment Roles Operations Manager, Area Manager - Retail, Guest Services Agent, Administrative Officer, Hospitality Management Faculty, Customer Service, Hospitality & Catering Manager etc.
Placement Opportunities Public health departments, Nursing homes, Hospitals etc

BMS Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Management Studies
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Management Studies [BMS] is 3 Years.
Age 17-23
Minimum Percentage 50% in 10+2 from a recognised board
Subjects Required Subjects related to Commerce stream in 10+2
Average Fees Incurred The average BMS course fee ranges from INR 8000 - 2 lakh per annum
Similar Options of Study BBA, BBM, B.Com, BBS
Average Salary Offered The average BMS salary is INR 4.26 lakh per annum
Employment Roles Marketing Manager, Marketing Executive, Business Development Manager, Research Analyst, Relationship Manager, Marketing Coordinator, Business Development Associate, Business Development Associate etc.
Placement Opportunities S&P, Corporate Executive Board (CEB) and other employment opportunities

BBM Course Details

Degree Bachelors
Full Form Bachelor of Business Management
Duration Course Duration of Bachelor of Business Management [BBM] is 3 Years.
Age The maximum age limit is 22
Minimum Percentage 50%
Subjects Required English
Average Fees Incurred The average BBM course fee ranges from INR 45,000 - 3 lakhs per annum
Similar Options of Study BBA, BBS, BMS, B.Com
Average Salary Offered The average BBM salary is INR 4.23 lakhs per annum
Employment Roles HR Manager, Financial Analyst, Operations Manager, Marketing Manager, Marketing Executive, Executive Assistant, HR Generalist, Business Development Manager, Business Development Executive etc.
Placement Opportunities Tata Consultancy Services Limited, Accenture, Ernst & Young, Wipro Technologies Ltd, HDFC Bank Pvt Ltd, Genpact, Amazon.com Inc, Deutsche Bank, Wipro, Concentrix Corporation, eClerx etc.
